results.title: Metformin enhances neural precursor cells migration and functional recovery after ischemic stroke in mice.
results.text_hl: Taken together, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ represents an optimal candidate agent for neural repair that is capable of not only expanding the adult @<m>DISEASE_Niemann_Pick_Disease_Type_C</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D052556 @@@NPC@@@ population but also subsequently driving them toward the destination for neuronal differentiation.

citations.NLM: Zhang L, Zhang J, Zhu X, Jiao W, Yang Y, Wu Y, Yang L, Wang Y. Metformin enhances neural precursor cells migration and functional recovery after ischemic stroke in mice. Exp Brain Res. 2023 Feb;241(2):505-515. PMID: 36611122
citations.BibTeX: @article{36611122, title={Metformin enhances neural precursor cells migration and functional recovery after ischemic stroke in mice.}, author={Zhang L and Zhang J and Zhu X and Jiao W and Yang Y and Wu Y and Yang L and Wang Y}, journal={Exp Brain Res}, volume={241}, number={2}, pages={505-515}}

results.title: Age- and sex-dependent effects of metformin on neural precursor cells and cognitive recovery in a model of neonatal stroke
results.text_hl: We demonstrate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Niemann_Pick_Disease_Type_C</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D052556 @@@NPC@@@ expansion and functional recovery is sex hormone dependent.

citations.NLM: Ruddy RM, Adams KV, Morshead CM. Age- and sex-dependent effects of metformin on neural precursor cells and cognitive recovery in a model of neonatal stroke Sci Adv. 2019 Sep;5(9):eaax1912. PMID: 31535024
citations.BibTeX: @article{31535024, title={Age- and sex-dependent effects of metformin on neural precursor cells and cognitive recovery in a model of neonatal stroke}, author={Ruddy RM and Adams KV and Morshead CM}, journal={Sci Adv}, volume={5}, number={9}, pages={eaax1912}}

results.title: Metformin Acts on Two Different Molecular Pathways to Enhance Adult Neural Precursor Proliferation/Self-Renewal and Differentiation
results.text_hl: Finally, we examined the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on adult @<m>DISEASE_Niemann_Pick_Disease_Type_C</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D052556 @@@NPC@@@ survival.

citations.NLM: Fatt M, Hsu K, He L, Wondisford F, Miller FD, Kaplan DR, Wang J. Metformin Acts on Two Different Molecular Pathways to Enhance Adult Neural Precursor Proliferation/Self-Renewal and Differentiation Stem Cell Reports. 2015 Dec 8;5(6):988-995. PMID: 26677765
